snippet: Gotham Chamber Opera’s production of Francesco Cavalli’s 1667 opera “Eliogabalo,” about the most flamboyant of Roman emperors, is being staged inside the most flamboyant of New York nightspots.
abstract: Gotham Chamber Opera’s production of Francesco Cavalli’s 1667 opera Eliogabalo, about the flamboyant teenage Roman emperor, is being staged inside The Box, equally flamboyant Lower East Side nightclub.
lead_paragraph: Gotham Chamber Opera’s production of Francesco Cavalli’s 1667 opera “Eliogabalo,” about the most flamboyant of Roman emperors, is being staged inside the most flamboyant of New York nightspots.

headline.seo: Gotham Chamber Opera’s ‘Eliogabalo’ Is at Home in The Box
